meta.label: Slack Message Fetcher
meta.description: Fetches messages and thread replies from Slack channels and saves them to a dataset.

outputRoles.name: data_output
outputRoles.label: Slack Messages Output
outputRoles.description: Dataset where the Slack messages and thread replies will be stored

params.name: include_private_channels
params.label: Include Private Channels
params.description: Whether to fetch messages from private channels. Requires bot to have 'groups:history' and 'groups:read' permissions and be added to the channels.

params.name: channel_names
params.label: Channel Names
params.description: List of Slack channel names to fetch messages from (e.g., #general, #random). The bot must be added to the channel. For private channels, the bot must have 'groups:history' and 'groups:read' permissions. For public channels, the bot must have 'channels:history' and 'channels:read' permissions.

params.name: user_emails
params.label: User Emails
params.description: List of user email addresses to fetch messages from the given channels. The bot must have 'users:read' permissions.

params.name: date_range_type
params.label: Date Range Type
params.description: Select how to define the time range

params.name: logging_level
params.label: logging level
params.description: The level of logging that the recipe generates
